title: Homesteading for Beginners
description: Why you shouldn't wait for the perfect time to start your homesteading dreams and goals. How to work with what you have right now. Even if you're in the city, how to begin homesteading now and how to transition from the city to your homestead. Learn why having a community is so important and how to move past discouragement.
content:encoded: Why you shouldn't wait for the perfect time to start your homesteading dreams and goals. How to work with what you have right now. Even if you're in the city, how to begin homesteading now and how to transition from the city to your homestead. Learn why having a community is so important and how to move past discouragement.
itunes:subtitle: 9 Transition Tips from City Life to Homesteader
author: melissa@melissaknorris.com (Melissa K. Norris 5th Generation Homesteader)
itunes:author: Melissa K. Norris 5th Generation Homesteader
